scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npx @11ty/eleventy --serve" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:scripts" "npm run watch:tokens"
scripts.build: npm run tokens && env NODE_ENV=staging npx concurrently "npx @11ty/eleventy --pathprefix 'nma_v4'" "npm run prod:sass" "npm run prod:scripts"
scripts.production: npm run tokens && env NODE_ENV=production npx concurrently "npx @11ty/eleventy" "npm run prod:sass" "npm run prod:scripts"
